$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

geospatial_map_v1_base_url.description: Base URL for the geospatial information provider's implementation of the interfaces/automated_testing/geospatial_map/v1/geospatial_map.yaml API

participant_id.description: ID of the geospatial information provider for which geospatial data can be queried

timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds to allow for requests to this geospatial information provider.  If None, use default.
